Articles.Content: I have seen is some videos where they are able to connect structural panels end to end. How do they do that?
You just have to keep wiggling them around until they snap into place. It's kind of hard, but there's no special trick to it.

Another thing that helps is to turn angle snap off, if it's on.

But yes, having a steady hand on the mouse is a big part of getting them lined up just right.
